snippet.title: Last Epoch Official Technical Trailer
snippet.description:
The fight for Eterra begins on February 21st, 2024. 

Pre-Order your copy to get the exclusive "Golden Guppy" cosmetic pet, and if you already have a copy of Last Epoch you can upgrade to one of the fantastic editions! 

Last Epoch - Deluxe Edition: https://store.steampowered.com/sub/990874/
Last Epoch - Ultimate Edition: https://store.steampowered.com/sub/990875/

If you have already purchased Last Epoch - You can Upgrade here: 

Deluxe Upgrade: https://store.steampowered.com/sub/990898/
Ultimate Upgrade: https://store.steampowered.com/sub/990899/

Wishlist on Steam or Join the war for Eterra early: https://store.steampowered.com/app/899770/Last_Epoch/

About Last Epooch
Uncover the Past, Reforge the Future. Ascend into one of 15 mastery classes and explore dangerous dungeons, hunt epic loot, craft legendary weapons, and wield the power of over a hundred transformative skill trees. Last Epoch is being developed by a team of passionate Action RPG enthusiasts. 

FOLLOW US
Get the Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/899770/Last_Epoch/
Website: https://lastepoch.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/lastepoch
Forum: https://forum.lastepoch.com​
Twitter: https://twitter.com/lastepoch
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lastepochgame/
